io.vertx.ext.unit.junit

Annotation Type Repeat


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Repeat
    Annotates a test method to repeat this test several times. This can be useful when a test fails randomly and not often.
    Author:
    Tim Fox

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      int value 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean silent 

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract int value

      • silent

        public abstract boolean silent
        Returns:
        true if Vertx Unit repeat test in silent mode
        Default:
        false
